hadiths.text: Narrated Ibn `Abbas:The Prophet (ﷺ) said, "Give the Fara'id, (the shares prescribed in the Qur'an) to those who are entitled to receive it, and then whatever remains, should be given to the closest male relative of the deceased

chapter.ara-name: باب مِيرَاثِ الْجَدِّ مَعَ الأَبِ وَالإِخْوَةِ
chapter.eng-name: The shares of inheritance for the paternal grandfather, the father and brothers
